short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Build a message for our networking community!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool which helps one to create a more readble WhatsApp messages into WhatsApp groups by adding a link to WhatsApp API with the number of the user/sender and also by adding to the message a Read more button, which helps to keep messages shorter and more precise to the use of publications in big WhatsApp groups.
